alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, WESTERN HOCKING, EASTERN PICKAWAY, NORTH CENTRAL PIKE, SOUTHWESTERN LICKING AND EASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Groveport to 6 miles north of Waverly, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Reynoldsburg, Chillicothe, Pickerington, Circleville, Heath, Granville, Waverly, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, South Bloomfield, Millersport and Kingston. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 110 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Pike; Ross
